securityEntry.securityDescription:
BACKDOOR	= 0x%8X
FPROT		= 0x%4X
FSEC		= [KEYEN=%2b, MEEN=%2b, FSLACC=%2b, SEC=%2b]
FOPT		= [-=%2b, FAST_INIT=%b, RESET=%b, NMI=%b]
-		= 0x%2X

BACKDOOR	= 0x%8X
FPROT		= 0x%4X
FSEC		= [KEYEN=%2b, MEEN=%2b, FSLACC=%2b, SEC=%2b]
FOPT		= [-=%6b, EZPORT_DIS=%b, LPBOOT=%b]
FEPROT		= 0x%X		FDPROT	= 0x%X
